description: This file defines a frontend webpage component named 'BuilderHome' using the Lightning.js framework. It constructs a layout with a top bar, sidebar, canvas, and properties panel, and manages layout state based on theme parameters.

classes.name: BuilderHome
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the main layout of the webpage builder, including top bar, sidebar, canvas, and properties panel sections.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines reactive state variables for layout dimensions and colors, based on theme settings.

methods.description: Lifecycle hook that ensures the store plugin is initialized when the component is ready.
